tagline.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND DINNER TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY WATER SPORT ACTIVITY AND ENJOY DINNER AT JIMBARAN BEACH
tagline.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND DINNER TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY WATER SPORT ACTIVITY AND ENJOY DINNER AT JIMBARAN BEACH
tagline.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND DINNER TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY WATER SPORT ACTIVITY AND ENJOY DINNER AT JIMBARAN BEACH

description.text: Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Package in Bali Islands to Enjoy Water Sports Packages activities and continue having fresh seafood dinner at jimbaran bay beach. Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour will enjoy visiting Bali Water Sports provider for having Water Activity package such as Banana Boat, Flying Fish, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands, other water sports activity available with own expenses and continue the tour to visit Jimbaran Bay beach for having romantic and delicious fresh seafood dinner, after finish the dinner we will drop you back to your hotel with bring wonderful memory. The Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour will bring you to the wonderful memory with two different experiences as the feature of this package. Our professional Bali Tours Driver is always outstanding offer our best services to keep your convenience trip along with private full air-conditioning car transfer to complete your enjoyable on Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour. Below is short description places of interest will be visit during Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour.

description.text: Bali Water Sports is experience to enjoy marine activities with full of fun and excitement. Enjoy your Marine recreation of Bali Water Sports package such as: Banana Boat, Flying Fish, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands, other water sports activity available with own expenses, Perhaps all of us love the adventure of water, here you can do water activities that have been provided and do not doubt they've experienced so all you get a warranty. Enjoy this wet adventure for your enjoyment. Is good choice if you like Water activity and wet adventure in the beach. Never missed the exicetement Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour during your holiday in Bali islands.

title.title: Fresh Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach | Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour
title.text: Fresh Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach
title.html: Fresh Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach

image.title: Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour | Jimbaran Bay Dinner | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Jimbaran Beach is beautiful beach with white sand and located in the southern part of Bali with white sand unfolding along the coastal. Jimbaran is famous for fishing village due mostly pople live here work as a sailor due near with beach and now is getting famous for fresh seafood dinner with different taste from other seafood. There are plenty of cafes offer delicious of seafood Dinner with breathtaking view of Indian Ocean. It is served right on the beach with beautiful table set up apposite to the ocean. Is amazing delicious fresh seafood dinner with amazing Balinese dance performance during the dinner.

price.title: Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,475,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 750,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 675,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 625,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour include :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Watersports Packages :
    1. Flying Fish (2 Fly)
    2. Banana Boat (15 Minutes)
    3. Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands (60 Minutes)
  • Fresh Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach
  • Mineral Water
  • Using facilities locker, shower and changing room
  • Insurance coverage during water sports activities

itinerary.title: Bali Water Sports and Dinner Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Bali Water Sports Tour Packages
Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
